channel.title: food trucks – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: Louie’s Bistro
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is the Duck Confit with Port Wine Onion Jam and Carrots sandwich from Louie’s Bistro. It’s every bit as delicious as the title makes it sound. Louie’s is one of our favorites and it’s great options like this that make it so. You can follow Louie’s Bistro on twitter.

The post Louie’s Bistro appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is the Duck Confit with Port Wine Onion Jam and Carrots sandwich from Louie’s Bistro. It’s every bit as delicious as the title makes it sound.

Louie’s is one of our favorites and it’s great options like this that make it so.

item.title: Cafe Rouge Express
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is the Jammer from Cafe Rouge Express. It’s a shrimp po’ boy without the bun served over french fried. It’s every bit as amazing as it looks. Seriously, it’s delicious and I want some more. Sorry, I forgot to mention that this is a food truck and you can find them on Twitter. Thanks […]

The post Cafe Rouge Express appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is the Jammer from Cafe Rouge Express. It’s a shrimp po’ boy without the bun served over french fried. It’s every bit as amazing as it looks.

Seriously, it’s delicious and I want some more.

Sorry, I forgot to mention that this is a food truck and you can find them on Twitter. Thanks for asking alykathinkss.

The post Cafe Rouge Express appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: All Things Sweet
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is the chocolate peanut butter cupcake from the All Things Sweet Truck. This truck is part of the culinary program at the Orlando Union Rescue Mission where they are teaching culinary skills to people in transition. The proceeds from the cupcake sales help to fund the program. The cupcakes are well worth the price […]

The post All Things Sweet appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is the chocolate peanut butter cupcake from the All Things Sweet Truck. This truck is part of the culinary program at the Orlando Union Rescue Mission where they are teaching culinary skills to people in transition. The proceeds from the cupcake sales help to fund the program.

The cupcakes are well worth the price of $4. First of all, they’re huge. Second, they’re delicious. They hold up to the other great cupcake trucks in town.

You can find All Things Sweet at their website.

The post All Things Sweet appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Bem Bom
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
We’ve covered Bem Bom before, but what is not to love with their Portuguese inspired favorites? Pictured at the top left is the Prego de Porco, which is a 12-hour braised pork that literally just melts in your mouth. It’s topped with a bunch of amazing stuff, including a Bem Bom specialty sauce, and packed […]

The post Bem Bom appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
We’ve covered Bem Bom before, but what is not to love with their Portuguese inspired favorites?

Pictured at the top left is the Prego de Porco, which is a 12-hour braised pork that literally just melts in your mouth. It’s topped with a bunch of amazing stuff, including a Bem Bom specialty sauce, and packed between a Portuguese roll – kind of like a softer ciabatta. It is an amazing sandwich.

At the top right was a special of the day, a lamb burger with a homemade tomato marmalade, feta cheese, and a bunch of other good stuff. It was served with the same great Portuguese roll.

Finally, the other special of the day, were the fries cooked in truffle oil and seasoned with rosemary and 24-month aged parmesan cheese. To say these were amazing would be an understatement.

If you haven’t eaten at Bem Bom (Portuguese for “good good”) then find them tonight.

The post Bem Bom appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: La Empanada
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
It took almost a year, but I finally got to try the La Empanada truck. Pictured are the curry veggie and BBQ chicken empanadas. These little packets of awesome are flakey, flavorful, and fantastic. If you haven’t tried La Empanada, don’t do what I did and put it off for a year. Go and find […]

The post La Empanada appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
It took almost a year, but I finally got to try the La Empanada truck. Pictured are the curry veggie and BBQ chicken empanadas. These little packets of awesome are flakey, flavorful, and fantastic. If you haven’t tried La Empanada, don’t do what I did and put it off for a year. Go and find them today!

The post La Empanada appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: The Mangia Mobile
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
The Mangia Mobile is a new food truck in town serving up Italian favorites. I’m a sucker for good, creamy pasta so this was a no brainer for me. This is the Pasta Ashley: a chicken, alfredo sauce, and sun dried tomatoes combination on top of fettuccine. It was really good. The sauce was great. […]

The post The Mangia Mobile appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
The Mangia Mobile is a new food truck in town serving up Italian favorites. I’m a sucker for good, creamy pasta so this was a no brainer for me.

This is the Pasta Ashley: a chicken, alfredo sauce, and sun dried tomatoes combination on top of fettuccine. It was really good. The sauce was great. I would have preferred a bit more sun dried tomatoes, but that might just be me. It was a really good dish and something unique from a food truck here in town.

You can follow the Mangia Mobile on Twitter.

The post The Mangia Mobile appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: The Big Cheese
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
The Big Cheese is a new food truck here in Orlando serving up unique grilled cheese combinations. This one combines a sweet bbq pulled pork with a creamy macaroni and cheese, between two grilled pieces of toast of course. It’s an amazing combination that seems like a no-brainer in hindsight, but is delicious. The truck […]

The post The Big Cheese appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
The Big Cheese is a new food truck here in Orlando serving up unique grilled cheese combinations. This one combines a sweet bbq pulled pork with a creamy macaroni and cheese, between two grilled pieces of toast of course. It’s an amazing combination that seems like a no-brainer in hindsight, but is delicious.

The truck offered a number of other combinations, plus build your own options with all the ingredients. And honestly, who doesn’t like a nice grilled cheese sandwich?

You can find The Big Cheese on Twitter.

The post The Big Cheese appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Local Yolk’l
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
The Local Yolk’l is a fairly new food truck here in Orlando that is serving breakfast all day long. Considering you can’t really go wrong with breakfast, this is a great idea! Pictured at the top is the Hat Trick – three egg, bacon, and monterey jack cheese sliders that had some sort of great sauce […]

The post Local Yolk’l appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
The Local Yolk’l is a fairly new food truck here in Orlando that is serving breakfast all day long. Considering you can’t really go wrong with breakfast, this is a great idea!

Pictured at the top is the Hat Trick – three egg, bacon, and monterey jack cheese sliders that had some sort of great sauce on it. These things were awesome. They came served with home fries and was plenty of food for me.

Though because I couldn’t resist, I had to go for dessert and ordered the Chocolate Covered Bacon. I didn’t really know what to expect, but was surprised that the salty bacon didn’t shine through the sweet chocolate as much as it did. It was good. Kind of like chocolate with a crispy, crunchy center.

If you’re in the mood for breakfast, and who isn’t, then track down the Local Yolk’l truck today.

The post Local Yolk’l appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: Stay Clam Cupcakes
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Look out Yum Yum, there’s another cupcake truck in town! Stay Calm Cupcakes is a new truck providing quality cupcakes from their truck window. Pictured here is the banana split, which was a banana flavored cake filled with a strawberry cream and topped with chocolate icing and a cherry. It was very good. Carla was […]

The post Stay Clam Cupcakes appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
Look out Yum Yum, there’s another cupcake truck in town!

Stay Calm Cupcakes is a new truck providing quality cupcakes from their truck window. Pictured here is the banana split, which was a banana flavored cake filled with a strawberry cream and topped with chocolate icing and a cherry. It was very good.

Carla was a fan of the pumpkin spice cupcake and I also enjoyed the Boston creme.

If you see Stay Calm on the road, do what the say: “stay calm and have a cupcake!”

You can find Stay Calm Cupcakes on Twitter.

The post Stay Clam Cupcakes appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.

item.title: The Flattery
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
Once again, The Flattery is on point. This is the Surf ‘n Turf flatbread featuring scallops and bacon. Killer stuff. We’ve talked about The Flattery a good deal and that’s because everything we order from this truck is amazing. You can find The Flattery on Twitter.

The post The Flattery appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
